name: MEC Timeless Covet Dress - Women's
description:
Simple, soft and stretchy, this light summer dress is patio ready. With its classic A-line silhouette the Timeless Covet dress lives up to its name.Light recycled polyester blend has plenty of spandex for a comfortable stretch.Deep placket helps keep you cool.2 stealthy drop-in pockets.High-low hem.UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV.DWR finish keeps your dress looking better between washes and makes it dry even quicker.Relaxed fit offers a casual all-day comfort.

        Sustainability
